author: kn:ez.no
msg: - Made start header level configurable in XHtml RST body visitor

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Fixed parsing of Authorization header in Apache.
# The raw header seems not to be provided, but only the preprocessed versions

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Finally fixed handling of empty display information.
# May have any headers (HEAD), but no content. If no Content-Length header is
# set, default it 0 so that clients don't wait for a body.

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Updated tests, after feature additions in the Mail component.
